titleStmt.title: Jojo's Bizzare Adventure: Steel Ball Run: Chapter 26
titleStmt.author: HiroHiko Araki

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: LISTEN... WE CALL THIS A "PLAN" MR. STEEL.
MURDER YOU SAY WATCH YOUR WORDS.
cbml:panel.desc: Illustration depicts President Valentine in an unorthodox pose.
Illustartion depicts Johnny, noticablely scratched up, riding away from a horde of crows on his horse.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THE ENEMY'S INTENTION ISN'T JUST TO WIN THIS RACE! JUST WHAT DO THEY WANT?
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny rides across the desert
A zoom in on Johnny's eyeball
Johnny looks to the sky

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I CAN'T SEE CLEARLY RIGHT NOW, BUT IS THERE A 'BALLOON' IN THE SKY SOMEWHERE?!
HOW COULD THEY BE ATTACKING FROM SUCH A PLACE?!
cbml:panel.desc: A low view of Johnny and his horse
Johnny's horse suddenly disappears from beneath him
Johnny falls to the ground
Johnny continues to fall to the ground
Johnny hits the ground
Johnny rolls after his impact
Johnny continues to roll

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: SHIT! HOW ARE THEY DOING THIS?
cbml:panel.desc: Again, Johnny continues to roll

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: SHIIIT! WHERE IS IT AND WHAT IS IT!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny finally starts to stop himself by grabbing the earth beneath him
A closeup of Johnny's face with an ominous feather looming in the background
A zoom in on the aforementioned feather
Feathers fall from the sky
Johnny views the feather descending towards him
A hook lodges itself in Johnny's cheek
A zoom in on the hook in Johnny's cheek
The hook is seen connected to the feather
A zoom on the hook emerging from the feather
Johnny's face is pulled by the hook. Blood gushes from the wound
Johnny is dragged by the hook
A closeup of Johnny's feet being dragged

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: A FEATHER THAT FELL OF THOSE BIRDS THAT WERE FLYING BY?!... HOW DID IT?
IT... CAME OUT OF THE FEATHER!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny continues to be dragged
A closeup of Johnny's fingernails. They are glowing a light blue
Johnny jabs at the wire of the hook
Closeup of the wire responding to Johnny's jabs
The wire does not break

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THERE'S A METAL-LIKE WIRE COMING FROM THE FEATHER!
cbml:panel.desc: Wire emerges from the feather
Johnny is dragged upward
The hook yanks itself out of Johnny's cheek, leaving a gaping wound
The hook grabs Slow Dancer's saddle bag
Johnny hits the ground
The saddle bag gets sucked into the feather
A closeup of Johnny's face, highlighting his facial wound
Johnny eyes the feather

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: MY STUFF WENT INTO THE FEATHER!
THROUGH THE FEATHER?! DOES IT CONNECT TO A DIFFERENT DIMENSION?! 'GYRO' AND THE 'HORSE' WERE CAUGHT BY THAT 'HOOK' AND PULLED IN THERE!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny's face with a grimace
Hooks emerge from the feathers again, much to Johnny's suprise
A closeup of Johnny's face, with everything except his eyes darkened
The hooks drag along the ground toward Johnny
The hooks continue to drag along the ground toward Johnny

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THERE WASN'T JUST ONE FEATHER! NOW THERE'S TWO HOOKS! FROM TWO DIFFERENT FEATHERS!
cbml:panel.desc: A closeup of Johnny's face
The hooks continue to drag along the ground toward Johnny

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THE ENEMY WILL TRY TO HOOK ME IF IT'S THE LAST THING THEY DO!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny with his arm swung above his head
The hooks continue to drag along the ground toward Johnny
Johnny spies a rocky outcropping
A zoom on the aforementioned outcropping

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THERE'S SOME EMPTY SPACE UNDER THAT ROCK! I NEED TO GET THERE!
I JUST NEED TO HIDE UNDER THAT THERE!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny crawls away from the hooks toward the rocky outcropping.
A closeup on the hooks
Johnny reaches toward the reader, as the hooks follow close behind
The hooks swing rapidly around Johnny
Johnny shoots his nails into the earth
The hooks swing as Johnny is obscured by dust
The hooks swing as Johnny is obscured by dust
A closeup of Johnny's hand
Johnny rolls away on his fingernails
Johnny rolls beneath the rock outcrop
Johnny hides as the hook fast approach
Closeup of the hooks
Johnny cries out as the hooks slam the ground
Johnny hides underneath the rock. Wired is nowhere to be seen
The hooks sink down outside the rock
The hooks swing toward Johnny
Closeup of Johnny's shocked face
Johnny grabs the hooks...
...and disables them
The hooks rise again...
...and gently swing
Johnny hides under the rock as Wired swings in front of him
Johnny hides
Johnny continues to hide
Johnny hides as Wired taps the top of the rock

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THE ENEMY IS ABOVE THIS ROCK?
...AND IT SEEMS LIKE THEY WOULD KILL ME WITHOUT HESITATION...!
B... BUT... WHAT WOULD THEY GAIN FROM ATTACKING ME?!
THEY HAVE MY HORSE! IF MY HORSE DIES, I'M OUT OF THE RACE! MY BAGGAGE! MY SADDLE!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny continues to hide
Closeup of Johnny
Johnny looks at his hand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...IS 'SEARCHING' FOR SOME-THING...? IS THAT THEIR GOAL...?!
cbml:panel.desc: The past three panels make a singular image of Johnny's hand as he stares out from under the rock
Closeup of Johnny's hand
Johnny grasps his left hand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: DID THE 'ENEMY' FOLLOW US SEARCHING FOR 'IT'?!
I SAW IT ONLY FOR A SLIGHT MOMENT!... AND IT WENT INTO MY 'LEFT HAND'! I THOUGH I WAS HALLUCINATING...
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny continues to look at his hand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THAT 'LEFT HAND' LOOKED LIKE IT WAS MUMMIFIED...! I 'FOUND' IT EVEN BEFORE I TOOK NOTICE OF IT... OR, IT CAME TO ME... (IS IT STILL IN MY ARM NOW?)...
cbml:panel.desc: The mummified hand emerges from the ground

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'M STARTING TO UNDERSTAND THE GOAL THE 'ENEMT'... AT FIRST THEY ATTACKED GYRO, THINKING IT WAS SOMETHING HE HAD WITH HIM...
THEN THEY STOLE HIS LUGGAGE AND HORSE, IN THAT ORDER...! SINCE THEY COULDN'T FIND IT, THEY'RE ATTACKING ME NOW!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny looks out from under the rock

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...THEY THOUGHT THAT IT WAS SOMETHING WE WERE HIDNG!
EVEN OYECOMOVA! AND STROHEIM! THEY WERE AFTER THIS ALL ALONG!
THIS IS THE TERRORISTS' TRUE GOAL DURING THE RACE!... I HAD NO CLUE, BUT THEY WERE AFTER THE 'MUMMIFIED ARM'!
cbml:panel.desc: A far out shot of the rock. Wired hangs over it. Portirats of Stroheim and Oyecomova are present in the corner

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: BUT WHAT IS IT? THAT MUMMY! 'WHOSE ARM' IS IT?!
cbml:panel.desc: An image of the mummified hand
The feathers above the rock
A zoom of one of the feathers
The feathers in a pool of water. Wired is sticking through them
A figure stands above the pool, wired spinning around him
Two fishing reels pull Wired into a mouth
A different view of the reels, this time showing some tongue
Wired is being yanked up
A mouth with two fishing reels in it
Wired is being pulled into a boy's mouth
A hand grabs the feathers attached to Wired
The hooks land on the boy's tongue
The boy poses with Johnny and Gyro's gear surrounding him
The boy eyes a rock
The boy picks up a rock
The boys bashes it against Slow Dancer's saddle bag
The boy continues to slam it against the bag
The boy continues to slam it against the bag
A closeup of his face
The boy continues to slam it against the bag
The boy reaches into the bag
The boy pulls out a pen
Ink drips from the pen
The boy sniffs the pen
The boy shakes the pen
The boy shakes the pen
A drop of ink drops onto the boy's finger
The boy sticks the pen in his mouth
The boy drinks the ink from the pen
Ink spews from his mouth as he throws the pen aside
The boy's mouth is coated in ink

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: SO HE'S THE ONE WHO 'HAS' IT... HE'S GOT IT SOMEWHERE...
HE MUST BE HIDING IT SOMEWHERE ON HIS BODY... GACHANGE!
cbml:panel.desc: The boy leans over a bowl of water
A zoom out of the boy. Gyro can be seen in the corner of the frame
Gyro's feet hanging in the air
Gyro is hung on a rock by his hair
A closeup of Gyro's face highlighting a wound in his chin
Blood drips from Gyro's hand
Blood drips from Gyro's hand
Blood drips on Gyro's steel ball
Gyro's steel ball with a drop of blood
Gyro's steel ball with a drop of blood
Gyro's steel ball with a drop of blood with Gyro's feet above it
Johnny's hand
Johnny reaches into his pocket for one of Gyro's steel balls

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: WHERE DID YOU GO FROM HERE?
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny drops his Gyro's ball

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: WHERE EXACTLY IS THE ENEMY'S VANTAGE POINT?
THERE MAY BE SOME DISTANCE, BUT THEY SHOULDN'T BE 'THAT' FAR AWAY.
EVEN IF THE ENEMY'S PURPOSE IS TO FIND THE 'MUMMY' THAT THEY STILL HAVEN'T FOUND, IT WOULDN'T MAKE SENSE FOR THEM TO KILL HIM UNTIL THEY AT LEAST HAVE THE 'HAND' AND CAN CONFIRM THAT IT EXISTS.
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny peers out from the rock

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS... HELP ME, GYRO...
I ONLY WANTED TO WIN THIS RACE... I ONLY WANTED TO KNOW THE SECRET OF YOUR 'STEEL BALLS'
BUT NOW, IF I STEP OUT OF THE ROCK SHELF... I'LL BE KILLED...
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny looks out from the rocky outcropping

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT THEY'RE AFTER ME... HELP ME...
WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO?
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny leans on his arm
A beetle approaches Johnny
A zoom on the beetle and Johnny's hand
Johnny sceptically eyes the beetle
Johnny makes a motion toward the beetle
Johnny's fingers starting to form a flick
Johnny flicks the beetle
One of Wired's hooks lodges in Johnny's hand
The hook is seen coming out of the beetle
The hook is seen coming out of the beetle
Closeup on Johnny's face
The hook is seen coming out of the beetle
Johnny is dragged by the hooks
Johnny attempts to grip the rock as the Wired attempts to pull him out

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: TH... THE HOOKS AREN'T ONLY FROM THE 'FEATHERS'...
cbml:panel.desc: The hook is imaplaed in Johnny's hand
Johnny cries out as the hook continues to pull on his hand
Johnny uses his fingernails in attempt to slow Wired's pull
Johnny's hand gets twisted as he contines to clutch onto the rock
The hook continues to pull on Johnny

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I... I NEED TO REMOVE THIS HOOK! QUICK!
IT'S PULLING ME OUT! AS SOON AS I'M DRAGGED OUT FROM ROCK, I'M DONE FOR!
cbml:panel.desc: The hook continues to pull on Johnny
The hook is impaled in Johnny's hand as more beetles approach
More beetles approach
A group of four beetles over look Johnny
The beetles crawl on Johnny's face
Another hook shoots out of the Beetles into Johnny's jaw
The hooks pull Johnny upward
A closeup of Johnny's face with the wire slightly visible
Johnny's hand being torn by the hooks
The mummified hand starts to emerge from Johnny's

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I CAN'T STAND IT ANYMORE! I'LL BE PULLED OUT, AND AS SOON AS THEY SEE I HAVE THE 'MUMMIFIED HAND', THEY'LL KILL ME!
TH... THEN FINE... I'LL... DRAG IT OUT...
IF YOU WANT IT SO BAD, I'LL GLADLY HAND IT OVER...!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny continues to be dragged out by the hooks

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: IT'S NOT LIKE I GOT THIS BECAUSE I WANYED IT! THIS BIZZARE 'MUMMIFIED HAND'!
I DON'T NEED IT! I'LL GIVE IT TO YOU, SO JUST TAKE IT!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny continues to be dragged out by the hooks as the mummified hand continues to emerge
A pink creature begins to emerge from Johnny's arm
A closeup on Johnny's eyes. He appears disstressed
A pink arm graps onto Johnny's arm
A closeup of the pink focusing on it's golden eye
Johnny's reaction as the pink creature emerges from his arm
A full image of Tusk Act 1 as it fully emerges
Johnny stares at Tusk Act 1
A closeup on Johnny's face
Tusk Act 1 crawls on Johnny's arm
Tusk Act 1 floats above Johnny's arm
Tusk Act 1 floats above Johnny's arm
Tusk Act 1 floats Ttoward Johnny's face
Closeup of Johnny's eye
Closeup of Tusk Act 1
Closeup of Johnny's eye
Tusk Act 1 jumps down Johnny
Johnny's face. Blood pours from his wounds and mouth
Tusk Act 1 approaches Johnny's foot
Tusk Act 1 approaches Johnny's foot
Tusk Act 1 approaches Johnny's foot
Tusk Act 1 causes Johnny's toenails to fire out from his feet
Johnny's toenails burst through the rock
Johnny's toenails head straight for Pork Pie Hat Kid's face
A closeup of Pork Pie Hat Kid's eyeball
The toenails nail him in the face, causing blood to spot from his face and Wired to be pull back through the bowl of water
Dust disapates from where Johnny attacked from
Dust disapates from where Johnny attacked from
Dust disapates from where Johnny attacked from
Tusk Act 1 reaches down
Johnny's arm has repaired itself
Johnny's shoes are ripped, now exposing his toes
Johnny's face
Johnny's shoes are ripped, now exposing his toes
Tusk Act 1 float above Johnny, it looks happy

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THEY SHOT OUT... 'THIS POWER'...! FROM THESE LAME FEET!
DID 'IT' DO IT...?! WHAT DOES THIS MEAN? DID IT JUST SAVE ME FROM MY SITU-ATION?!.........
cbml:panel.desc: Tusk Act 1 float above Johnny

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: MY NAILS JUST SHOT OUT FROM MY LAME FEEEEEEEET!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny screams in amazement
Johnny's toenails fire again
The toenails fly off into the distance
Tusk Act 1 cutely hugs Johnny's wrist
Johnny screams
Tusk Act 1 =waves
Tusk Act 1 taps Johnny's arm
Johnny looks at Tusk Act 1
Tusk Act 1 starts to move rapidly
The letters 've' appear on Johnny's arm
Tusk Act 1 carves 'moveer crus' into Johnny's arm
A closeup of Johnny's eye
Johnny looks at the text carved in his arm
Johnny looks for Tusk Act 1 which has already dissappeared back into his hand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: IT JUST WROTE SOMETHING!! ...AND WENT BACK INTO MY 'LEFT HAND'!
JUST NOW!! IT HAS A WILL! THIS MUMMIFIED LEFT HAND HAS A CLEAR WILL OF ITS OWN!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny grips his left hand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: MY FEET AREN'T MOVING NOW... ONLY WHEN THEY 'SHOOT OUT' THE NAILS, THEY MOVE...
...THAT 'ENERGY' WAS TAKEN FROM MY BODY?... THROUGH THIS THING'S WILL...?
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny grips his left hand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THERE ARE TOO MANY MYSTERIES EVERYWHERE...
AND THIS STEEL BALL RUN RACE...
WHY HAS THIS THING COME TO ME?
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny eyes his arm. Behind him are portraits of Gyro, Tusk Act 1, Stroheim, Oyacomova, and Stephen Steel
Johnny puts his head in his hand, blood seeps from his mouth
Zoom in of previous panel
Johnny stares at his hand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THERE HAVE TO BE OTHER PARTS
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny crawls on the ground

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: AND IF YOU COMBINE THEM ALL, IT WILL PROBABLY BE A FULL BODY!
cbml:panel.desc: An image of the corpse put together

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THE CORPSE OF 'SOMEBODY' HAS BEEN SCATTERED ACROSS THE LAND!
THEY'RE TRYING TO FIND THEM AND COMBINE THEM TOGETHER!
THAT'S THE GOAL OF THE TERRORISTS!
cbml:panel.desc: Various corpse parts strewn about an canyon

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ON THE SURFACE IT'S JUST A SPORT! BUT THE 'STEEL BALL RUN' IS ACTUALLY A CONSPIRACY TO COLLECT ALL THESE BODY PARTS!
cbml:panel.desc: White

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THESE POWER POSSESSSING CORPSE PARTS... WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IF THEY ALL CAME TOGETHER?
DID GYRO KNOW ABOUT THESE 'CORPSES'? DID HE JOIN THE RACE WITH THAT KNOWLEDGE?
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny gritting his teeth
Johnny holds on of Gyro's steel balls as a second on appears on the horizon
Closeup on the ball
Closeup on the ball to show it spinning
Zoom out on the ball
Johnny gripping the first steel ball
Johnny looks up
Pork Pie Hat Kid lays on the ground in pain

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THREE OF MY TEETH ARE BROKEN!
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid sits up, his face bloodied

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I WONDER IF TEETH TASTE GOOD? I BET YOU CAN'T EAT 'EM...
SHIT I DIDN'T KNOW HE HAD THAT KIND OF 'POWER'... THAT...
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid, quite literally, licks his wounds

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: NOW I HAVE TO SWIPE IT FROM HIM! AFTER I KILL HIM, THOUGH!
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid looks into the bowl of water

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: BUT NOW I KNOW WHERE HE'S HIDING IT...
I CAUGHT A GLIMPSE OF IT FROM ABOVE! HE DIDN'T FIND IT; IT POSSESSED HIM!
THE 'CORPSE' IS IN JYAWNEE JYWASHTER'S ARM!
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid mischeviously look up
Pork Pie Hat Kid peers into the bowl
Destroyed rocks
Destroyed rocks

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THAT CREEP... WHERE IS HE? THAT'S... WEIRD...
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid screams
Wired descends toward the destroyed rocks
Wired descends toward the destroyed rocks
Wired descends toward the destroyed rocks

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: WHAT IS THIS?... WHERE IS HE?!
HE DISAP-PEARED... WHERE DID HE GO?
THAT'S CRAZY! EVEN IF HE RAN, HE WOULDN'T GET FAR FROM THE...
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid looks through the bowl
Intense zoom on Pork Pie Hat Kid's eyes
Wired descends toward a line in the sand
The line is revealed to have been caused by Gyro's second ball
Pork Pie Hat Kid looks back
Gyro is hanging on the corner of the frame
Wired smacks Gyro
Gyro in pain

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: YOU THREW YOUR 'STEEL BALL' INTO MY PLATE DURING ALL THE EXCITEMENT, HUH?
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid looks at Gyro
Pork Pie Hat Kid turns toward a rock in the distance
Pork Pie Hat Kid saunters on top of a rock
Pork Pie Hat Kid stands

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: THE SPIN OF THE 'STEEL BALL'... THERE'S TWO WAYS TO THINK OF IT...
THAT YOU TOLD JYOSHTER TO RUN IN THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION!
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid looks over a hill while Gyro hangs

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: YOU TOLD HIM TO 'HEAD TOWARDS' THIS DIRECTION!
I'LL LET YOU LIVE, GYRO ZEPPELI.
BUT ONLY UNTIL I FIND WHERE JYAWNEE JYOSHTER IS...
cbml:panel.desc: Pork Pie Hat Kid looks at the reader
Gyro's ball in the sand
Gyro's ball
Gyro's ball
Gyro's ball

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: WHOEVER GYRO IS, AND WHATEVER KIND OF ORDERS HE HAD RECEIVED FROM HIS HOMELAND...
IT'S CLEAR NOW THAT THAT WILL NEVER CHANGE.
cbml:panel.desc: Gyro's ball

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: GYRO SHOWED ME THE DIRECTION OF THE 'ENEMY' WITH THE STEEL BALL.
IT MUST HAVE BEEN A DESPERATE MOVE.
AND OF COURSE I COULD CHOOSE TO RUN.
HE WAS TRYING TO SAVE ME...
cbml:panel.desc: A pile of sand
An eye in the sand

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: BUT I WILL NEVER HAND OVER THIS 'CORPSE'!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny in the sand
Johnny buried in the sand
Johnny's fingernails firing

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: AND GYRO HAS GIVEN ME THE COURAGE TO PUSH FORWARD IN THIS CRISIS
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny's fingernails firing

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: NOW I KNOW YOUR LOCATION! GYRO!
I'M HEADING TOWARDS THAT ROCK MOUNTAIN!
WE'RE TOGETHER IN THIS RACE! AND WE'LL COLLECT THE REST OF THE CORPSE PARTS!
cbml:panel.desc: Johnny's swimming in the sand
